name: Spin Masters
description:
Made in 3 hours for the 154th Trijam with the theme of "There's a twist"

Click or press any key when the moving triangular arrow is in the highlighted area.

The highlighted area will get smaller as the stage progresses.

The idea came from the bottlecap challenge that was trending several years ago done in the style of fighting game bonus stage/Wario Ware microgame with really simple controls.
